_header: Thee then we beseeken thy servants do good
_description: A couplet from the Te Deum translating, ‘Te ergo quesumus famulis tuis subueni quos precioso sanguine redimisti’ which precedes it in John Grimestone’s sermon notebook — one couplet

NLS18721.Transcription:
Þe þanne we beseken þi seruans do goodÞe wiche
                    þat þu bouthtest with þi dere blod
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 29.
